CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, May 17, 1958, pg. A18, reads: "Beauty Contestants In June 15 Show - Eight lovelies shown here area taking part in beauty contest which will be part of the Cotton Benefit Show, June 15, at Westray Plaza at 5 P.M., directed by dress designer-modiste Annabelle Robinson. Left to right, contestants for "Miss Bronze" title are Alberta Thompson, Jacqueline Lewis, Carol Jacobs, Doris Johnson, Sarah Lee, Janis Tihist.  Victoria Robinson and Deborah McKenzie. - Harris Photo. - Adv."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of contestants for "Miss Bronze" title, first row, from left: Alberta Thompson, Jacqueline "Jackie" Lewis [Jacqui Thompson], Carol Jacobs, Doris Johnson; second row: Deborah McKenzie, Sarah Lee, Janis Tihist, and Victoria Robinson, seated at edge of pool in interior with two-toned brick walls
